stimulusHtml:
Consider the following code segment.

int count = 0;

for (int k = 0; k < 10; k++)

{

count++;

}

System.out.println(count);

Which of the following code segments will produce the same output as the code segment above?
choicesHtml:
int count = 0;

for (int k = 1; k < 10; k++)

{

count++;

}

System.out.println(count);

int count = 1;

for (int k = 1; k <= 10; k++)

{

count++;

}

System.out.println(count);

int count = 1;

for (int k = 0; k <= 9; k++)

{

count++;

}

System.out.println(count);

int count = 0;

for (int k = 9; k >= 0; k--)

{

count++;

}

System.out.println(count);
